website_summaries.verdict: Classic formula at a budget-friendly price that has been loved for decades.
pros: Clean, crisp finish with subtle notes of powder, lavender, and musk
Effective at removing oil and adding texture without over-drying hair or scalp
cons: Must shake prior to use to avoid the deposit of white powder

customer_reviews.title: Faulty nozzle design EVERY time.
customer_reviews.text: I truly love the scent and that's probably why I've purchased this multiple times. Unfortunately, on both sizes of this product, the valve ALWAYS fails at some point. Sometimes it's when you're almost out of product and it's not as frustrating. Sometimes it happens when it's 3/4 full and it's 'too late' to return it. This is expensive enough and it's happened enough times now that I've decided I'll never order it again. Just not worth the gamble. Too bad. Lazy on the part of Fekkai.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used this product twice and it smelled good and seemed to work. It left a matte look over the top of my hair however. The worse part. Just like other reviews said... The nozzle stops working. I paid 14 bucks for a dry shampoo spray that no longer comes out.
customer_reviews.author: MARTY

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: DO NOT buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this product, in a 2-pack, and the nozzle fails. The window of time closed to return this by the time the product failed, so I am just out the money and this is an expensive product. It's dry shampoo so I only use it occasionally. Half way thru the first can, the nozzle froze and no product comes out. I opened up the second can and the nozzle does not work AT ALL. Nothing comes out. I will never buy this product again and am mad that I have no means of returning it to get my money back since this is obviously a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Smells sooooo good
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many dry shampoos and none come close to how nice this one smells. First time I tried was when I was getting the Birchbox sub, & have been hooked ever since. So to all the ladies with color treated hair like mine & don't wash every single day, this spray will make your hair smell as though it was!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R.

customer_reviews.title: Getting less for more than cost
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and same thing happened to me like other customers, nozzle stopped spraying half way through 1 of them, was sputtering and covered my cloths in white goo twice before it went out. Cleaned it multiple times, used a pin, etc. Did not fix. I am on the second now but spray seems thin. Not sure if it's old/expired or just recalled lot being sold but all the ones I bought in store never did this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty nozzle for a lot of bucks
customer_reviews.text: I like the product a lot but like others say, the faulty nozzle is the cause of my low rating. This product is spendy and to only be able to use it a couple times before it clogs is very disappointing. I wish I could return it but I will definitely not be buying it ever again! I plan to contact the company.
customer_reviews.author: J Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: You can see the powder
customer_reviews.text: Works great but is pricy. This use to be my favorite dry shampoo till I found a cheaper one that works better. This one still shows a bit of the powder. Works great on greasy hair but not worth the price anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Iceprincess

customer_reviews.title: Bad bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product when the bottle actually works. I have had 2 bottles (with at least 75% of the product still in the bottle) lose the pressure and the aerosol not work. This is a pretty expensive dry shampoo and the bottle should work!
customer_reviews.author: Re-Anna Bell

customer_reviews.title: favorite ever!
customer_reviews.text: I reorder this anytime I’m close To running Out. This is my favorite dry shampoo ever. You won’t be disappointed! Smells so clean, like you have just washed your hair. It’s not sticky or tacky. Leaves my hair soft. There is no white powder left in my hair like so many other brands. This is the best ever. I will never use another brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product I can't use
customer_reviews.text: I love this dry shampoo but I was only able to use it once before the can lost all pressure. I have a full can of dry shampoo that I can't use. This is not the first time this has happened with this product, I love it but am tired of wasting my money on something I can't actually use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love but poor package function
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite dry shampoo. And I absolutely am in love with its fresh smell. The downfall with this product that I experienced, is that the spray tip became non functional before the can was even half empty, and it happened to both of them, so the remaining was wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ALCOHOL!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product only once. I couldn’t give it another chance because when I sprayed it, it was if I had put straight rubbing alcohol into a spray bottle and spritzed it over my head. The smell was so bad, I honestly can’t remember if it took the oiliness out of my hair. Now it just sits on my shelf, an ugly reminder of a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: theMEESH

customer_reviews.title: The worst packaging - breaks immediately
customer_reviews.text: The merchant is great, but the product is garbage. I've purchase this three times now, from different merchants, and each time, the aerosol mechanism fails after a few uses. Spray doesn't work, so product does not come out, and you're stuck with a brand-new can full of product in it, and no way to get it out. Every single time!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Favorite dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love this dry shampoo. Great for dark hair and has a good smell that doesn’t linger too long. Both came un-damaged :)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Steffen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS STUFF! It is they best dry shampoo I have ever come across and I can easily get three days post wash using it even with my thin oily hair.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Bad Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Agree with other reviews. Have used for years and bought many of these in salons and amazon, but nozzle on both the last 2 bottles stopped spraying half way through using it. Threw away 2x now. Fekkai needs to fix this. Lost this customer until they do. :(
customer_reviews.author: S Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. Truly removes the grease from your hair. Note that is does have bit of that filmy feeling but it’s light and has a nice fragrance. It helps me get another one or two days after a salon blowout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Awful!!! Product works but I am on my 2nd bottle and both aerosol cans stop working mid way. This expensive product and now I am throwing out the 2nd one. I thought the first was just a defect but nope happened to the 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Long Islander

customer_reviews.title: Won’t spray
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but I have two cans that are still half full but won’t spray. And yes I shake my cans especially after the first one stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Salyer

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle Fail
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but can is about 1/2 full and the nozzle has failed! Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Stops Spraying
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 2 stars because of the amazing smell.....however, I have over half a can left and the bottle will not spray anymore. Very disappointing!!!!!!!! Money just wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Amspoker

customer_reviews.title: Left my hair stiff and dull. Not the best product I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Eh. So-so product. Left my hair stiff and dull. Not the best product I've ever tried, but I guess it works OK if you're in a pinch and want to freshen up your hair after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo is awesome because there isn't any powdery residue and it smells so good.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Bogden

customer_reviews.title: BAD nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and after only a couple uses the nozzle got clogged and I couldn't use anymore. I had to buy a whole new bottle. I have used this specific product for years and this is the first that this has happened. I am upset that I spent the money and bought this from amazon. ugh!
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer/mister quit working after one use
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent, but the sprayer/mister quit working after one use and the product is leaking out of the top. Very disappointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: works great, but wish they have liquid version as another ...
customer_reviews.text: works great, but wish they have liquid version as another brand I've used, it is the best powder so far, will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: squrrielley

customer_reviews.title: Aerosol runs out before the product does. Useless.
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this product, I really do. For the 4-5 times I used it, it worked great. I love the way it smells and feels in my hair, I love how easy it is to use, and it does exactly what a dry shampoo should. However, this product is ultimately a disappointment. After just a few uses, the aerosol runs out. I've had 2 different cans of this (1 purchased from Target, and 1 purchased from Amazon), and both of them did the same thing. This leaves you with lots of product left in the can, and no way to use it. So disappointing. Don't waste your money until Fekkai decides to correct this problem.
customer_reviews.author: TiBowers

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: My favorite dry shampoo! I love this brand and I'm always happy with there products. I would recommend this to anyone😁
customer_reviews.author: mimi martin

customer_reviews.title: SPRAYER QUIT AFTER ONE USE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT BUY THIS!!! I used once, and the sprayer quit working. Exasperating!!! What a rip-off for such an expensive product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Almost empty when I received it
customer_reviews.text: Bottle was nearly empty when I received it. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Helga

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t believe this is a true product. The scent and finish of this spray is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Plain

customer_reviews.title: Smells good. Gets rid of oily hair and gives volume
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. Gets rid of oily hair and gives volume. No white residue. Not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: an

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Love the product however the can I received had been used.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. The spray nozzle stopped working and I had at least 25% left to use out of the can. Will not be using again.
customer_reviews.author: Chirsty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hairspray I've ever used. Doesn't leave your hair too soft or too stiff - its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't leave my hair feeling dirty and it doesn't smell like chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Antoun

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but the pump on the can broke/became ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but the pump on the can broke/became clogged with more than half the product left. I've soaked it to unclog the nozzle with no luck. So, I have a can of product that I can't use. That I paid more for than I usually spend on hair care. Tragic.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Good dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have used this before but had a difficult time finding it again locally. I like to use it between shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Carlyle Morris

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: Do not get! I purchase these all the time and thought I would buy a few online to save some $...worst decision ever, the spray comes out white on your hair. I got 2 bottles, both spray white on my brown hair AND it doesn't allow u to return the product! I spray 6inches+ away from my hair, still comes out white. Not made right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Shampoo on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best dry shampoo I have ever used! I am usually a "wash my hair everyday" kinda gal, but I have been trying to wash every other day as my scalp gets dry in the winter. I needed a little something to help give my hair that freshly washed feeling without actually washing it in between shampoos. This dry shampoo seems to absorb the extra oil but doesn't leave a heavy residue. It has a light, fresh scent that makes me feel like my hair has been washed too. I will continue using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E

customer_reviews.title: It’s the Best; You Won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best dry shampoo/freshener I’ve ever used! The powder mist is very fine; after brushing through there’s no residue that shows on even dark hair. Excess oil and grease are gone and your hair is left soft and so clean smelling. Great clean scent. There are a lot of uses per can, I feel it economical. Amazon has the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: such a bummer
customer_reviews.text: I love the product itself but the packaging is terrible. I knew when I bought this that I would need to be careful about the spout, seeing that others had issues with the product hardening and not coming out. Well lo and behold, that happened. No matter what I do I cannot seem to clean the spout. The product is stuck inside and it was a wasted 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Kailei Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this dry shampoo!!  Aerosol runs out before you can use half of the product.
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointing product! After trying the smaller trial size of this dry shampoo I purchased this larger bottle. I used it only 3-4 times and yesterday when I tried to use it again there wasn't any aerosol left in it... just liquid. The container feels like it's at least 60% full of product but there's no aerosol left to help it come out. Naturally, this happens after I'm past the return window. :( Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Muxy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Clogged nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product for the couple times I used it. Works well, smells good (I hate powdery smells, and this one has much more of a fresh smell). But, after 3 very light uses, the nozzle clogged and I can’t get any more use fro it. Plenty of liquid left trapped in the bottle. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Tiptoe Tippy

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Shampoo I've found
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many brands of dry shampoo and this is the best one I've found. It is a bit harder to wash out compared to other brands, but that's worth it to me to have a product that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary User

customer_reviews.title: The Best Dry Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several dry shampoos and this one is by far the best! It doesn't leave white residue and it smells lovely. It also works the best in "cleaning" and it also gives volume. I have bought it several times and will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: thatgirl

customer_reviews.title: Defective nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would’ve listened to everyone else’s reviews the nozzle stopped working and I have a half can at least left do not buy this product
customer_reviews.author: amy nichelle

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Just like ALL other reviewers have mentioned, you don’t get your money’s worth because the nozzle will stop working halfway through your use of it. Nothing you do will revive the nozzle and it sucks because I LOVE the smell.
customer_reviews.author: L L.

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, the smell is amazing. BUT, I will never by this again. I have purchased 4 bottles and all of the bottles aerosol mechanisms stopped working halfway through the bottle. If you don't mind being wasteful this is a wonderful product, it does the job. Just don't expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really do what dry shampoo is supposed to do I.e. absorb the grease from the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Teejeronimo

customer_reviews.title: Broken spray can after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses, the nozzle broke and I was unable to get the product out of the cylinder.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: I liked the scent and texture however
customer_reviews.text: I liked the scent and texture however, it has turned liquid in the can and the aerosol spray no longer works. Maybe just a bad can.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite dry shampoo currently. It smells amazing and doesn't leave a white powder in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael MacArthur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product with a wonderful scent!. Is not heavy and does not show on my brunette hair.
customer_reviews.author: NutinButBoys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great product & the smell is wonderful. Holds & thickens the hair while it dissolves the oils.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J Mahaffey

customer_reviews.title: Happy hair.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work good in my fine hair on day 2. Easy to apply, brush and go. Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite dry shampoo! Smells amazing and works great!
customer_reviews.author: NoleChick95

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing !
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent and works better than other dry shampoos I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah Allen

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: The best dry shampoo I've ever tried, hands down. No white residue or weird hair texture after spraying. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hollydoodle
